text:
Hi there,
I'm trying to use an embedded form on a custom multi-language website (not using HubSpot CRM). I can properly translate the field names and validation messages using the `locale` and `translations` options. However, the consent text remains in the primary language of my organization. Yet the translations of this text is provided in the settings of HubSpot, but I don't see any option to use the translated version.
Has anyone encountered a similar issue ?

Documentation link : <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/reference/cms/forms>
